author: francescobrivio
body:
#### PR description:
This PR is partially a backport of #36133 since it adds the PilotBeam data to the relval matrix workflows, and partially a backport of #36326 since it contains updates to the offline Run3 data GT in preparation for the re-reco.

Changes are:
 - Offline Run3 data GT is updated in preparation of the PilotBeams2021 re-reco
 - Added wfs: `136.899, 138.4, 138.5, 139.001, 139.002, 139.003, 139.004`, see #36133 for more details
 -  a modifier `'--procModifiers':'siPixelQualityRawToDigi'` is added in step3 of the 139.00* workflows (MinBias, ZeroBias and HLTPhysics) to pick up the new tag included in the GT following changes introduced in #36286

Diff in GT:
**Run 3 data (offline)**
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/121X_dataRun3_v8/121X_dataRun3_v12

#### PR validation:
Validated with:
`runTheMatrix.py -l 136.897,136.899,138.1,138.2,138.3,138.4,138.5,139.001,139.002,139.003,139.004 -j8 --ibeos`

#### Backport:
Partial backport of #36133 and #36326
title: [12_1_X] Add PilotBeam data in relval matrix and update Run3 data offline GT
